item.title: Hiking and Board games
item.description: There are 2 available activities: Hiking across the mountains near Chambéry during 2 or 3 hours Several board games to play with everyone

item.title: Hiking and Climbing
item.description: There are 2 available activities: Hiking across the mountains near Chambéry during 2 or 3 hours A 3 hours climbing session, it will be outdoor or indoor depending on the weather
